HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Delivery is calculated based on weight: up to 2 kg - 5,20 EUR; up to 3 kg - 5,50 EUR; up to 5 kg - 5,95 EUR; up to 10 kg - 7,20 EUR; up to 15 kg - 8,20 EUR; up to 20 kg - 9,65 EUR; up to 25 kg - 10,90 EUR; up to 30 kg - 11,90 EUR; up to 40 kg - 13,70 EUR.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping is available for orders above a certain amount, but the threshold is not specified.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke vrši se nekoliko puta tjedno, sukladno rasporedu dostave za pojedini otok, osim na neka mjesta gdje dostavna služba ne vrši dostavu.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Pricing is based on weight, as per the provided table (e.g., 45 kg for 32,00 EUR, up to 700 kg for 158,05 EUR).
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands is carried out several times a week, according to the delivery schedule for each island, except for some places where the delivery service does not deliver. No surcharge is mentioned.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery for standard and bulky items, as well as free in-store pickup. Parcel shop and parcel locker delivery are not available.
PROVIDERS: The specific courier service is not named; the terms refer to a 'reputable delivery service'.
PRICING: Home delivery costs are based on weight, starting from €5.20 for packages up to 2 kg and increasing with weight, covering items up to 700 kg. Free shipping is mentioned for orders above a certain value, but the threshold is not specified. In-store pickup is free of charge.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is available only within the Republic of Croatia. Delivery to islands follows a specific schedule and may not cover all locations; no island surcharge is mentioned.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The service includes delivery for very heavy and bulky products. There are 8 physical store locations available for free personal pickup.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is found within the comprehensive 'Terms of Purchase' page. While the pricing structure is detailed with a weight-based table, key details like the free shipping threshold and courier names are missing. The information would be more user-friendly if presented on a dedicated shipping page rather than being embedded within the general terms and conditions.
